definition: to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)

sentences.english: The way of the warrior is resolute acceptance of death.
sentences.chinese: 武士道，即为凛然赴死之道。

sentences.english: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die.
sentences.chinese: 死亡我并不畏惧，但急着赴死也并非是我的本意。

sentences.english: In order to assist the commandos, the east China sea dragon to body is to die, driving a car stopped kawasaki.
sentences.chinese: 为了协助突击队，东海龙以身赴死，开车拦住川崎。

sentences.english: For seven months she died in public.
sentences.chinese: 她就这样当众慢慢赴死，长达七个月。

sentences.english: Sima admires to die a martyr's death but not to give up one's life carelessly.
sentences.chinese: 司马迁赞赏慨然赴死的勇气，但反对随意地放弃生命。

sentences.english: And so, the younger one chose death.
She found Dungen Tian wanted to die, how to persuade to persuade him not to move.
sentences.chinese: 她发现田敦艮一心想要赴死，怎么劝都劝不动他。

sentences.english: They went to their death unflinchingly, worthy of the title of heroes.
sentences.chinese: 慷慨赴死，从容就义，他们当之无愧。

sentences.english: For a chance of living, they were willing to die!
sentences.chinese: 为了给生命留下一丝机会，他们愿意赴死。

sentences.english: At the age of 39 I died in honor and was the last Pharaoh of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 我39岁就光荣赴死，成了埃及历史上最后一位法老。

definition: to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
heroically sacrificing one's life (idiom); to sacrifice oneself fervently to the cause
to give up life for righteousness (idiom, from Mencius); to choose honor over life/would rather sacrifice one's life than one's principles
to extend one's neck in preparation for execution (idiom)
to drift and live without purpose (idiom); to drag out an ignoble existence
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
to give one's body for the nation (idiom); to spend one's whole life in the service of the country
to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
to die without regret (idiom, from Analects)
to display utter loyalty/to be loyal to the end
